explains: v. 瘸着脚走，跛行；进展缓慢，艰难地行进
adj. 柔软的，不直挺的；无力的，无精神的

sentences.en: She was told to reject applicants with limp handshakes.
sentences.cn: 有人告诉她通过无力的握手来拒绝申请者。

sentences.en: I wasn't badly hurt, but I injured my thigh and had to limp.
sentences.cn: 我伤得并不严重，但我伤到了大腿，不得不一瘸一拐地走路。

sentences.en: A stiff knee following surgery forced her to walk with a limp.
sentences.cn: 手术后僵直的膝盖迫使她瘸着走路。
